title: Uvalde students walkout to protest gun violence
description: Uvalde students staged a walkout to protest gun violence.

description: An Alaska man known for illustrating widely distributed children’s books with cute mother-baby animal pairs has been dropped by his publisher after authorities allege he posted transphobic notes threatening children

description: A sneaky pooch named Millie entertained her owner by stealing a pacifier from her human sibling.

description: Former President Donald Trump’s criminal indictment by the Manhattan District Attorney’s office is both troubling and historic.

description: A tiny stowaway octopus that attached itself to a diver's gear was safely returned to the ocean after being discovered inside a car.

title: Ex-Infowars employee who stormed Capitol gets home detention
description: A Texas man who worked for conspiracy theorist Alex Jones’ website, Infowars, has been sentenced to four months of home detention for joining a mob’s attack on the U.S. Capitol

description: The United States Park Police released video on Tuesday showing the moment one of its officers shot and killed a teenager last month in Washington, D.C.

title: Pence won't fight order to testify before grand jury investigating Jan. 6
description: Vice President Mike Pence will not appeal a district court ruling and will comply with the grand jury subpoena requesting documents and testimony related to Jan. 6.

description: A man has been charged for allegedly threatening a prominent LGBTQ rights organization.

title: Hospital: Treatment, discharge of woman who died appropriate
description: A Tennessee hospital said it gave appropriate medical treatment to a woman who died after being discharged, but would change some of its security procedures

title: This state's governor just signed a bill repealing a 1931 abortion ban
description: Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer signed a bill into law Wednesday repealing a 1931 aboriton that criminalized the procedure.

title: Man charged with assaulting clerk with frozen fish
description: The suspect allegedly "became angry" because the fish counter was closed, the Macomb County Prosecutor's Office said in a press release on Wednesday.

description: Prince Harry is expected to testify in a London courtroom in June in one of his phone hacking lawsuits against British tabloids

title: Gender-affirming care for transgender youth banned in Idaho
description: Idaho’s governor has signed a bill criminalizing gender-affirming medical care for transgender youth
